TEXT: She wakes from her dream, hazily sees a tower, allured by the fragrance of wine, setting her poetic heart ablaze
NL You finish your wine. Your tail a brush, ink like shadow NL wind blows and swrod plays, rain washes over. NL   Untrained Liquor, Pellucid Heart

On a dim street, you see sketchy hooded figures performing dark ritual. When you get close, they all turn to you, creeping you slightly. The tallest of them smiles wickedly, showing their wickedly long teeth, reaching you out with their hand NL ”join us, poet,and gift us a poem for the warmth of the spire tonight”
Since im here... NL Ill protect the land...
Observe... NL This civilization... This land...
